original_text: But you did an even worse thing. You killed my children. You offered them as sacrifices to idols!
korean_text: 나의 자녀들을 죽여 우상에게 넘겨 불 가운데로 지나가게 하였느냐

sentences.original_text: But you did an even worse thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 더 나쁜 일을 저질렀다.

sentences.original_text: You offered them as sacrifices to idols!
